subprocess_flow.description: Establish the fundamental characteristics of the world, including its size, shape, and overall environment. This involves determining the physical dimensions, geographical layout, and environmental conditions that will support life and natural processes. The parameters set in this stage will influence all subsequent design and development phases.
success_criteria: Clearly defined world size and shape
subprocess_flow.purpose: To set the basic physical and environmental attributes of the world.
subprocess_flow.scope: Determining the size, shape, and environment of the world.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: World parameters are not conducive to life
step_risks_and_controls.control: Thorough simulation and testing of various parameter combinations

change_management.versioning_rules: Major changes require complete world reset

subprocess_flow.description: Formulate the laws of physics and chemistry that will govern the world's natural processes. This includes defining the fundamental forces, chemical interactions, and physical constants that will dictate how matter and energy behave. These laws must be internally consistent and capable of supporting complex systems and life forms.
success_criteria: Functional and stable laws of physics and chemistry
Laws are consistent with world parameters
subprocess_flow.purpose: To establish the rules that govern the world's natural processes.
subprocess_flow.scope: Defining the fundamental laws of physics and chemistry.
end_conditions: Laws of physics and chemistry are fully defined

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Incompatible laws of physics and chemistry
step_risks_and_controls.control: Thorough testing and simulation of interactions

change_management.versioning_rules: Major changes require complete world reset

subprocess_flow.description: Develop a comprehensive plan for the initial geological features of the world, including the arrangement of continents, oceans, and major landforms. This involves simulating tectonic activity, erosion, and other geological processes to create a diverse and functional landscape. The plan should also consider the distribution of essential minerals and resources.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To design the physical structure and resource base of the world.
subprocess_flow.scope: Planning the initial geological features and resource distribution.
triggers: Laws of physics and chemistry are fully defined

step_risks_and_controls.control: Careful simulation and adjustment of geological parameters

change_management.versioning_rules: Major changes require complete world reset

subprocess_flow.description: Design the initial atmospheric composition of the world, ensuring it is suitable for the development of life. This involves determining the proportions of various gases, such as oxygen, nitrogen, and carbon dioxide, as well as considering factors like air pressure and temperature. The atmospheric plan should also account for the establishment of a functional water cycle.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To design an atmosphere conducive to life and natural processes.
subprocess_flow.scope: Planning the initial atmospheric composition and hydrological cycle.
triggers: Laws of physics and chemistry are fully defined

change_management.versioning_rules: Major changes require complete world reset
